input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product features and product specification below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product specification:
Lumisol Solar Color Dragonfly Pool Light

Product features:
Charged by the sun during the day.
Dragonfly automatically illuminates and changes color at night
Color-changing LED (Red, Green, Blue)
Perfect for decorating and lighting your garden, pond, and/or pool
Rechargeable battery included
Light will operate 6 to 8 hours after a full charge
environmentally friendly,energy-saving, reduces carbon emission
3.94 x 5.63 x 5.12 inches.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Lumisol Solar Color Dragonfly Pool Light is a highly advanced and technologically superior pool and garden lighting product. The Dragonfly light is charged by the sun during the day, and automatically illuminates and changes color at night. The color-changing LED (Light Emitting Diode) provides a spectacular multicolored display of Red, Green and Blue light. The Dragonfly light is the perfect decorative lighting solution for your garden, pond or swimming pool, providing attractive and magical illumination of these special outdoor areas. The Dragonfly light includes a rechargeable battery with long lasting, environmentally friendly operation, which reduces carbon emissions and energy consumption. The rechargeable battery provides 6 to 8 hours of continuous operation after a full charge. The Dragonfly light measures 3.94 inches in length, 5.63 inches in width, and 5.12 inches in height, and
input_text.Response B:
Introducing the Lumisol Solar Color Dragonfly Pool Light - the perfect addition to your outdoor space! This color-changing LED pool light is not only environmentally friendly and energy-saving, but it also reduces carbon emissions. The best part? It's completely autonomous, charging by the sun during the day and automatically illuminating and changing color at night.

This light is perfect for decorating and lighting up your garden, pond, and/or pool. With a diameter of 3.94 x 5.63 x 5.12 inches, it's small enough to be placed in any area. The included rechargeable battery will operate the light for 6 to 8 hours after a full charge.

The Lumisol Solar Color Dragonfly Pool Light is a great choice for those who want to add a touch of magic to their outdoor space. Whether you're hosting a party or just enjoying your own time in the garden, this light will add a touch of whimsy and charm.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.

label_annotations.factors_a: The prompt requested a fun response and it is not fun.
